items.name: Rick and Morty: The Pickle Rick Game
items.description: A board game where players take on the roles of different Ricks and compete in a Pickle Rick-themed adventure.

items.name: Rick and Morty: Total Rickall Card Game
items.description: A card game based on the 'Total Rickall' episode, where players must figure out who among them is a parasite.

items.name: Rick and Morty: Anatomy Park: The Game
items.description: A strategy board game where players build a theme park inside the body of Ruben, a homeless man.

items.name: Rick and Morty: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind Deck-Building Game
items.description: A deck-building card game where players take on the roles of different Ricks, battling for supremacy.

items.name: Rick and Morty: The Ricks Must Be Crazy Multiverse Game
items.description: A strategy game that lets players create and control their own mini-universe.

items.name: Rick and Morty 1000-Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
items.description: A jigsaw puzzle featuring a colorful and detailed design inspired by the show.

items.name: Rick and Morty: Shy Pooper 1000-Piece Puzzle
items.description: A puzzle featuring the 'Shy Pooper' character from the show, with 1000 pieces for a challenge.
